Message.Title: Mitt Romney invited Taiwan and China to invest in Bain Capital in 1984 in exchange to outsource job to China/Taiwan!
Message.Msg: Americans are too ignorant about Mitt Romney! Mitt Romney traveled to Asia to sign up first wave investors for Bain Capital in 1984! He specifically stated he would help these Asian countries to pressure US corporations to outsource manufacturing jobs to Taiwan/China and other Asian countries as an exchange for these nations to invest in his Bain Capital! He sold out Americans! That is why the jobs in big companies went to Asia! We still have the new clips to show he joined then dictators in Taiwan and China to invite them to invest foreign exchange reserve money $20 billions in Bain Capital! That is why Mitt Romney has a house in Cayman Island, so do Taiwan and China government foreign exchange reserve managers also have houses in Cayman Island! Today, Chinese Communist party has $200 billions investment in US corp. from Cayman Island and Taiwan has $150 billions investment in US corp. from Cayman Island! They want to make sure US corporations keep outsource to Taiwan and China!

Message.Title: Top Reasons Libs Hate Romney
Message.Msg: 1. Been married to ONE woman his entire life, and has been faithful to her, including through her bouts with breast cancer and MS. 2. No scandals or skeletons in his closet (no close friends with backgrounds in domestic terrorism) 3. Can't speak in a fake, southern, "black preacher voice" when he thinks it necessary. 4. Highly intelligent. Graduated cum laude from both Harvard Law School and Harvard Business School...and by the way, his academic records are NOT sealed. After Harvard, he passed the Michigan bar exam, but never worked as an attorney. 5. Doesn't smoke, drink alcohol or take drugs including cocaine. 6. Represents an America where people work hard and become SUCCESSFUL! 7. Has a family of five great sons....none of them have police records or are in drug rehab. But of course, they were raised by a stay-at-home mom, and that "choice" deserves America 's scorn? 8. Oh yes.....he's a MORMON. (never sat in church while a racist pastor was God d*amning America) We need to be very afraid of that very strange religion that teaches its members to be clean-living, patriotic, fiscally conservative, charitable, self-reliant, and honest. 9. His brain is fully functional at high altitudes

Message.Title: Wow! Romney 8 Point Swing in Colorado... Put Colorado in the Red Category!
Message.Msg: Romney leads in 1st post-debate poll in Colorado Denver Business Journal by Mark Harden, New Media Editor Date: Saturday, October 6, 2012, 11:24am MDT - Last Modified: Saturday, October 6, 2012, 11:29am MDT Mitt Romney leads President Barack Obama in a Colorado opinion survey conducted after Wednesday's presidential debate at the University of Denver. The poll by Florida research firm Gravis Marketing of likely Colorado voters, conducted Oct. 3-4, shows Republican Romney favored by 49.4 percent and Democrat Obama by 45.9 percent, a difference of 3.5 percentage points. It's a reversal of the result of Gravis' latest pre-debate poll of Coloradans, conducted Sept. 25, that showed a 4.7-point advantage for Obama. Obama and Romney debated at DU on Oct. 3, but Gravis said it conducted its most recent survey after the debate. Most pundits have said the felt Romney prevailed over Obama in the faceoff, their first of three scheduled debates.
